name: Sprint 3 (vanshika)
description:
left click to draw animated objects

right click to erase manually; left click when using the clear all button

use the sliders to adjust the color, opacity, and glow for future and current objects 

use the dropdown menus to choose a prefab, and the Anim1 dropdown to change the type of animation

use the toggle to turn on/off timed destroy and randomization of speed and type of animation

click on the clock's hours or the AM/PM button to change the time of day
